Manx: Padjer ayns Gaelg:
English: A prayer in Manx:
Diplomatic: Padjer ayns Galg:

Manx: O Uss ta Çhiarn erskyn dagh nhee
English: O, You are Lord above every thing
Diplomatic: O Uss ta Chiarn erskin dagh nhee

Manx: Ta er yn ooir rouaill
English: That wonders on the Earth
Diplomatic: Ta er yn ooir rowaill

Manx: Ayns myghyn gow seose slane my chree
English: In mercy, take up the entirety of my heart
Diplomatic: Ayns myghyn ghow seose slane my chree

Manx: As jean mee y hauaill
English: And save me
Diplomatic: As jean mee y hauaill

Manx: O gow dagh smooinnaghtyn neughlen
English: O take all impure thoughts
Diplomatic: O ghow dagh smooinaghtyn neughlen

Manx: Ersooyl as lhian lesh graih
English: Away, and adhere with love
Diplomatic: Ersooyl as lhian lesh graih

Manx: As siyr dagh peccah magh ass shin
English: And hurry every sin out from us
Diplomatic: As siyr dagh peccah magh as shin

Manx: Gys hee’m ayns Niau dy oaie
English: Until I see your face in Heaven
Diplomatic: Gys hee’m ayns Niau dy oaie

Manx: Gow çhymmey jee’m ta geam son graase
English: Be compassionate towards I, who calls for grace
Diplomatic: Gow chymmey jee’m ta geam son graase

Manx: Shooyl maart hene ayns shoh
English: Walking with you here
Diplomatic: Shooyl maart hene ayns shoh

Manx: As jean mee aarloo son y vaase
English: And make me ready for death
Diplomatic: As jean mee aarloo son y vaase

Manx: Nish choud as ta mee bio
English: Now, whilst I am alive,
Diplomatic: Nish choud as ta mee bio

Manx: Chouds ta mee ayns yn seihll er-mayrn
English: Whilst I remain in the world,
Diplomatic: Chouds ta mee ayns yn seihll ermarn

Manx: Cur dou dty spyrryd mie
English: Give me your good spirit
Diplomatic: Chur dow dy spyrryd mie

Manx: Dy voddym ooashlagh oo my Hiarn
English: So that I can worship you my Lord
Diplomatic: Dy voddym o oaishlagh oo my Hiarn

Manx: Lesh aigney feagh cheustie
English: With a calm mind within
Diplomatic: Lesh aigney feeagh cheustie

Manx: Shione dhyt dagh nhee ta taghyrt dou
English: How well you know every thing that happens to me
Diplomatic: Shone dhut dagh nhee ta taghyrt dow

Manx: Dagh seaghyn as dagh feme
English: Every sorrow and every need.
Diplomatic: Dagh seaghyn as dagh feme

Manx: O cur dagh oyr dy peccah mow
English: O destroy every cause of sin
Diplomatic: O cur dagh oyr dy peccah mow

Manx: Ta mee dy imlee geam
English: I humbly call
Diplomatic: Ta mee dy ymlee geam

Manx: Nagh ren Oo choyrt dty vac hene sheese
English: Did you not send your own son down,
Diplomatic: Nagh ren Oo churt dy vac hene sheese

Manx: Dy voddyn gheddyn bea
English: So I can find life
Diplomatic: Dy voddyn gheddyn bea

Manx: Bish ayns dty ghraih as dy erreeish
English: Prosper in your love and your compassion
Diplomatic: Bish ayns dy graih as dy eeresht

Manx: Cur dou veih peccah fea
English: Give me rest from sin
Diplomatic: Cur dow veih peccah fea

Manx: Nish skeayl yn graih ayd er cheustie
English: Now spread your love within
Diplomatic: Nish schuayl yn graih ayd er cheustie

Manx: Er ghraih dty ennym hene
English: For the love of your name,
Diplomatic: Er ghraih dy ennym hene

Manx: As lieen mee lesh dty spyrryd mie
English: And fill me with your good spirit
Diplomatic: As lieen mee lesh dy spyrryd mie

Manx: As brish dagh geuley jee’m
English: And break every fetter from me
Diplomatic: As brish dagh gowley jee’m

Manx: O jean mee aarloo dy choyrt sheese
English: O make me ready to surrender
Diplomatic: O jean mee aarloo dy churt sheese

Manx: My vioghys ec dty ghoo
English: My life at your word
Diplomatic: My viogys ec dy ghoo

Manx: Dy noddym fakin eddin Chreest
English: That I may see the face of Christ
Diplomatic: Dy noddym fakin eddyn Chreest

Manx: Raad nagh vel baase ny smoo
English: Where there is no more death
Diplomatic: Raad nagh vel baase ny smoo

Manx: Dy chiauleeagh dy bragh ayns Niau
English: To sing forever in Heaven
Diplomatic: Dy chiauleeagh dy braagh ayns Niau

Manx: Jeh graih yn Çhiarn hur baase
English: Of the love of God who suffered death
Diplomatic: Jeh ghraih yn Chiarn hur baase

Manx: Son slane sluight Adam trooid sheelnaue
English: For the whole offspring of Adam throughout humanity
Diplomatic: Tan slane sluight Adam trooid shelnaue

Manx: Cha niartal va e ghraase
English: So mighty was his grace.
Diplomatic: Chaniartal va y graase
